page.title: 04MR.TUCK
page.content: Mr Tuck was born on the 15th march 1907 in a public house on Ingelstone Common called the Fox and the Hounds. His family owned the Public House for 30 years.Mr Tuck did not want to take over the job at the Public house.When Mr Tuck was old enough to go to the Infants school Miss Bruton was the head.Mr Tuck had a long way to go across the common.Sometimes he went on the milk cart.Mr Woodford who was the head at the boys Endowed school.Mr Tuck used to tease Mrs King at lunch time.Some of the boys from th common threw snowballs at the under teacher Miss Sainsbury.Miss Lello,the head at the girls school,gave the boys a plot of land.When Mr Tuck left school he stayed home to mind his parent's animals.Mr Tuck cycles round the village visting his friends and relations.
